com.wolvencraft.yasp.db

Class Query.DatabaseQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.Query.DatabaseQuery
  • Enclosing class:
    Query

    public class Query.DatabaseQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a standard database query
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Query.DatabaseQuery(java.lang.String table)
      Default constructor
      Creates a new DatabaseQuery instance with the specified table name.
      While it is possible to create an instance of this class manually, it is recommended to use the table(String table) method in the Query class.

      • selectAll

        public java.util.List<Query.QueryResult> selectAll()
        Builds and runs the SELECT query that returns a list of results from the database
        Returns:
        List of results. Might be empty.

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Checks if the query will yield any results
        Returns:
        true if the query has any results, false if it is empty

      • insert

        public boolean insert()
        Builds and runs the INSERT query
        Returns:
        true if the value was successfully inserted, false if an error occurred

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Builds and runs the UPDATE query
        Returns:
        true if the value was successfully updated, false if an error occurred

      • update

        public boolean update(boolean force)
        Checks if the row that is up for updating exists. If it does not, it is created.
        Returns:
        true if the value was successfully updated, false if an error occurred

      • delete

        public boolean delete()
        Deletes a row from the database
        Returns:
        true if the row was deleted, false if an error occurred
